channel.title: this is not another mental breakdown.

item.title: what am I doing
item.description:
What am I doing with my life. What current projects am working with at the momet?

  • I got a game development project going on in LÃ–VE..
  • I am learning Haskell.
  • I am working on a Software Defined Radio solution for SEAM.

I do have stuff to do…

item.title: wasd keyboard
item.description:
I got a new keyboard! It is a 60% keyboard I bought from WASD keyboards. Under the hood it got mx green switches which is meant to have similar actuation force as the IBM Model M. Model M has actually a higher actuation force, but this keyboard looks less clutterly :-)

Looks nice, doesn’t it? It made my table more spacier than ever :-)
